00122 class EGS_COLLIMATED_SOURCE_EXPORT EGS_CollimatedSource :
00123           public EGS_BaseSimpleSource {
00124 
00125 public:
00126 
00132     EGS_CollimatedSource(int Q, EGS_BaseSpectrum *Spec,
00133             EGS_BaseShape *sshape, EGS_BaseShape *tshape,
00134             const string &Name="", EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0) :
00135             EGS_BaseSimpleSource(Q,Spec,Name,f), source_shape(sshape),
00136             target_shape(tshape), dist(1), ctry(0) { setUp(); };
00137 
00142     EGS_CollimatedSource(EGS_Input *, EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0);
00143     ~EGS_CollimatedSource() {
00144         EGS_Object::deleteObject(source_shape);
00145         EGS_Object::deleteObject(target_shape);
00146     };
00147 
00148     void getPositionDirection(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm,
00149             EGS_Vector &x, EGS_Vector &u, EGS_Float &wt) {
00150         //x = source_shape->getPoint(rndm);
00151         x = source_shape->getRandomPoint(rndm);
00152         int ntry = 0;
00153         do {
00154             target_shape->getPointSourceDirection(x,rndm,u,wt);
00155             ntry++;
00156             if( ntry > 10000 )
00157                 egsFatal("EGS_CollimatedSource::getPositionDirection:\n"
00158                  "  my target shape %s, which is of type %s, failed to\n"
00159                  "  return a positive weight after 10000 attempts\n",
00160                  target_shape->getObjectName().c_str(),
00161                  target_shape->getObjectType().c_str());
00162         } while ( wt <= 0 );
00163         //egsInformation("got x=(%g,%g,%g) u=(%g,%g,%g) wt = %g ntry = %d\n",
00164         //        x.x,x.y,x.z,u.x,u.y,u.z,wt,ntry);
00165         ctry += ntry;
00166     };
00167 
00168     EGS_Float getFluence() const {
00169         double res = ctry; return res/(dist*dist);
00170     };
00171 
00172     bool storeFluenceState(ostream &data) const {
00173         return egsStoreI64(data,ctry);
00174     };
00175 
00176     bool setFluenceState(istream &data) {
00177         return egsGetI64(data,ctry);
00178     };
00179 
00180     bool addFluenceData(istream &data) {
00181         EGS_I64 tmp; bool ok = egsGetI64(data,tmp);
00182         if( !ok ) return false;
00183         ctry += tmp; return true;
00184     };
00185 
00186     bool isValid() const {
00187         return (s != 0 && source_shape != 0 && target_shape != 0 &&
00188                 target_shape->supportsDirectionMethod() );
00189     };
00190 
00191     void resetFluenceCounter() {ctry = 0; };
00192 
00193 protected:
00194 
00195     EGS_BaseShape *source_shape,  
00196                   *target_shape;  
00197     EGS_I64       ctry;           
00198     EGS_Float     dist;           
00199 
00200     void setUp();
00201 
00202 };
00203 
00204 #endif
